DOC.brief_title: A Study TMC435 Genotype 1 , Hepatitis C-infected Patients Who Relapsed After Previous Interferon ( IFN ) -Based Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm study evaluate efficacy safety TMC435 combination standard care ( SoC ) , PegIFNα-2a ( P ) ribavirin ( R ) , adult , genotype 1 HCV-infected participant relapse previous IFN-based therapy Japan . The study objective evaluate efficacy TMC435 percentage participant undetectable HCV ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) . Participants receive 12 week treatment TMC435 ( 100 mg ) daily plus PR follow 12 36 week treatment PR . TMC435 100-mg capsule take orally ( via mouth ) . Treatment PR last 24 48 week . Pegylated interferon supply vial contain 1.0 mL solution 180 µg PegIFNα-2a inject syringe skin weekly . Ribavirin give 200-mg tablet ( daily dose : 600-1000 mg ) , take orally two time day meal . The participant receive oral capsule TMC435 ( 100 mg ) daily Week 12 .
DOC.criteria: Participants must chronic genotype 1 HCV HCV RNA level > = 5.0 log10 IU/mL Participant relapse previous IFNbased therapy Participant must willing use contraceptive measure time inform consent 6 month last dose study medication .
